main.title: A Legacy of Quality Rice
main.paragraph1: Bhawani Shankar  Traders is a trusted rice trading and distribution company rooted in the rich agricultural heritage of India. We are dedicated to providing high-quality rice varieties, including Basmati, Sona Masoori, and Parboiled rice.
main.paragraph2: Our strength lies in sourcing directly from a network of dedicated farmers, ensuring that every grain is 100% pure and fresh. We deliver this quality to wholesalers, retailers, and households, building relationships based on trust and excellence.

items.title: Bulk Rice Supply
items.description: Reliable supply to wholesalers, retailers, and hotels with consistent quality.

items.title: Custom Packaging
items.description: Packaging and branding services for custom orders to meet your market needs.

items.title: Nationwide Delivery
items.description: Efficient local and national delivery network ensuring timely supply.

items.title: Export Quality
items.description: Premium, export-quality rice for our international clients across the globe.

seo.title: Bhawani Shankar Rice Traders: Premium Indian Rice & Exporter
seo.description: Bhawani Shankar Rice Traders provides high-quality Indian Basmati, Sona Masoori & Parboiled rice. Sourced directly from farmers, we supply pure, fresh rice to wholesalers, retailers & for export.
seo.keywords: Bhawani Shankar Rice Traders, Indian rice, Basmati rice, Sona Masoori rice, Parboiled rice, premium rice, bulk rice supply, rice wholesalers, rice exporters, custom packaging, nationwide delivery
